text: Good morning! How are you today?
I'm great, how are you?
Doing well, thanks :)  I'm waiting on a plumber to come fix my washer drain. It flooded the basement 0.0
I am sorry to hear that, my sister's car has to go in the shop too. Repairs suck.
Yes they do. My husband would say we should just be grateful we have a machine and indoor plumbing to fix. Lol he's like that, gotta love him ;)
That's sweet, you have a husband to help you. I am by myself.
I am lucky, I know it. Hubby would say, First World problems. Lol and he's right. That's what interested me in the option to donate part of what I make to Save The Children.
How often do you donate?
No set schedule, just whenever its offered here.The research team collects all donations and sends it for me. It's not a lot at once, but it adds up.
That's amazing, how much do you donate?
Unless I'm saving up for something urgent, 100%. I'll scale it down or skip a donation if I feel I need to. But usually it's such a little bite, it doesn't hurt ;)
You seem like a great person to be so charitable.

That's very sweet of you to say, but it's easy to be generous when all the hard parts are handled for you. They take the donation directly from your task payment, so there's no red tape or MATH involved LOL!
That seems easy enough and convenient.
Yes, and it makes me feel like I'm doing something just a little more worthwhile with my online time.
I think it's  a great cause.

If you are interested, here\'s the link to the charity:   URL    You "sign up" by just stating right here in chat what amount you would like to donate, from $0 to all your payment ($2 in this case, for me anyway). That\'s how I got started.
Thanks for the information, I would be happy to donate.
Great! Just be sure to state the amount of your donation before we stop chatting, so the research team will see it.
I would like to donate ten cents.
Great! Just be sure to state the amount of your donation before we stop chatting, so the research team will see it.
